org.placeName: Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT OURT, IN AND FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, NORTHERN DIVISION
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, Plaintiff, vs. HARRY SMITH, Defendant. No. _______ ORDER.

Upon the reading of the verified Petition of the above named petitioner, and upon the reading of the Affidavit hereunto annexed, and good cause appearing therefor, it is hereby ORDERED, ADJUDGED and DECREED:
1. That the petitioner may appearand prosecute this action in Forma Pauperis.
That the necessary fees and costs of court be paid by the Government.
IN THE U.S. DISTRICT COURT IN THE SUPERIOR COURT STATE OF WASHINGTON WESTERN DISTRICT, NORTHERN DEVISION
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, Plaintiff vs. Harry Smith, Defendant
FILED IN THE U.S. DISTRICT COURT, Western Dist. of Washington, Northern Division JUL 1-1916
FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk, By _________ Deputy
BEELER & SULLIVAN Lawyers 210-11 White Building, Seattle, Wash. Mals 367
Copy of within _________ received and due service of same acknowledged this ______ day of _____ 19__ Attorney for ___________
